They are failing to do their job while hardworking Americans show up to work every day, complete their work, and still live paycheck to paycheck.  I urge all Members of Congress to support my bipartisan Amendment to stop this ridiculous maneuver. https://www.rollcall.com/news/congress/pay-raise-amendments …

Congress has failed to pass a budget, failed to pass appropriations bills, repeatedly shut down the government, and allowed our immigration and heath care systems to continue to deteriorate. Members of Congress from both parties DO NOT deserve a pay raise.
